mxCell.value: Workday to Amex GBT Outbound Integration

Workday delivers full file to Amex GBT SFTP
(Username/password/SSH authentication)

Daily scheduled execution (Mon-Fri, 6:00 AM)
File naming: TFAL_HR_Daily_YYYYMMDDhhmmss.txt
QA: qfsgateway9.amexgbt.com | Prod: fsgateway9.amexgbt.com
Amex GBT retrieves and processes employee data
Updates travel management system and expense allocation

• Enterprise Interface Builder (EIB) executes scheduled integration
  • Custom report: CR INT004 Amex GBT Employee Data Outbound
  • Extracts active employees from FA and WNSL only
  • Filters: Active status, Employee worker type (excludes contractors)
  • Full file extract on each run
  • Data includes: Employee ID, title, name, cost center, emails, manager email, country

• Output formatted as pipe-delimited (|) text file
  • No header row - data rows only
  • Character encoding: UTF-8
  • File naming: TFAL_HR_Daily_YYYYMMDDhhmmss.txt
  • Sequence generator creates unique timestamp

• File transmitted to Amex GBT hosted SFTP server
  • QA: sftp://qfsgateway9.amexgbt.com
  • Production: sftp://fsgateway9.amexgbt.com
  • Destination directory: Inbox
  • Authentication: SSH (Username/Password)
  • SFTP encryption for data in transit

• Integration event logged in Workday Process Monitor
  • Output file attached to integration event for review
  • Status tracking: Completed, Completed with Warnings, Completed with Errors, Failed
  • Failure notifications sent to Integration Administrator only
  • No notifications for successful runs (reduce alert fatigue)

UserObject.label:
SECURITY & TECHNICAL DETAILS
  • Integration Type: EIB (Enterprise Interface Builder)
  • File Format: Pipe-delimited (|) text file, UTF-8, No header row
  • Expected Volume: 600-800 active employees
  • Encryption: SFTP protocol encryption for data in transit
  • Encryption: PGP Encrypted files
  • Authentication: SSH
  • File Naming: TFAL_HR_Daily_YYYYMMDDhhmmss.txt
  • Data Retention: Integration outputs stored in Workday for 180 days via Integration Events
  • Frequency: Daily (Monday-Friday, 6:00 AM - TBC)
  • Execution Time: Complete end-to-end within 10 minutes
  • File Size: Expected 50-100 KB
UserObject.name: Variable

UserObject.label:
SYSTEM OF RECORD
  • Workday HCM: Employee demographics, employment details, cost center, manager relationships
  • Scope: Active employees from The FA and WNSL only
  • %3CmxGraphModel%3E%3Croot%3E%3CmxCell%20id%3D%220%22%2F%3E%3CmxCell%20id%3D%221%22%20parent%3D%220%22%2F%3E%3CUserObject%20label%3D%22%26lt%3Bdiv%26gt%3B%26lt%3Bb%26gt%3BKEY%20ATTRIBUTES%20SYNCHRONIZED%26lt%3B%2Fb%26gt%3B%26lt%3B%2Fdiv%26gt%3B%26lt%3Bdiv%26gt%3B%26lt%3Bul%26gt%3B%26lt%3Bli%26gt%3BUnique%20ID%3A%20Primary%20Work%20Email%26lt%3B%2Fli%26gt%3B%26lt%3Bli%26gt%3BName%3A%20Legal%20First%20Name%2C%20Legal%20Last%20Name%26lt%3B%2Fli%26gt%3B%26lt%3Bli%26gt%3BContact%3A%20Primary%20Work%20Phone%2C%20Primary%20Home%20Phone%2C%20Primary%20Home%20Email%26lt%3B%2Fli%26gt%3B%26lt%3Bli%26gt%3BWork%20Details%3A%20Location%2C%20Division%2C%20Job%20Title%26lt%3B%2Fli%26gt%3B%26lt%3Bli%26gt%3BDevices%3A%20Work%20Phone%2C%20Home%20Phone%2C%20Home%20Email%20(with%20type%2C%20label%2C%20value%2C%20description)%26lt%3B%2Fli%26gt%3B%26lt%3B%2Ful%26gt%3B%26lt%3B%2Fdiv%26gt%3B%22%20placeholders%3D%221%22%20name%3D%22Variable%22%20id%3D%222%22%3E%3CmxCell%20parent%3D%221%22%20style%3D%22text%3Bhtml%3D1%3BstrokeColor%3Dnone%3BfillColor%3Dnone%3Balign%3Dleft%3BverticalAlign%3Dtop%3BwhiteSpace%3Dwrap%3Boverflow%3Dhidden%3BfontSize%3D14%3B%22%20vertex%3D%221%22%3E%3CmxGeometry%20height%3D%22160%22%20width%3D%22600%22%20x%3D%22600%22%20y%3D%22720%22%20as%3D%22geometry%22%2F%3E%3C%2FmxCell%3E%3C%2FUserObject%3E%3C%2Froot%3E%3C%2FmxGraphModel%3EExcludes: Terminated employees, contractors (contingent workers)
UserObject.name: Variable

UserObject.label:
KEY ATTRIBUTES SYNCHRONIZED
  • ID Number: Employee ID (unique identifier)
  • Title: Legal Name - Title (Mr, Mrs, Ms, etc.)
  • Surname: Legal Name - Last Name
  • First Name: Legal Name - First Name
  • Control Group: CF EE Control Group (hardcoded as "FA")
  • Default Expense Cost Code: Cost Center ID (for expense allocation)
  • Email Address: Primary Work Email or Primary Home Email
  • Manager Email: CF LRV Manager Email (for approval workflows)
  • Country: CF EE Country (UK/England mapping)
UserObject.name: Variable

UserObject.label:
Environment Notes
  • Sandbox/QA: qfsgateway9.amexgbt.com
  • Production: fsgateway9.amexgbt.com
  • Both environments use same file naming convention
  • Configuration manually replicated from Sandbox to Production
  • Amex GBT validates sandbox files before production go-live
UserObject.name: Variable
